name: Penny

topics.response_text: Thanks for helping us, mungo. You're not so bad for a mungo.

topics.topic_text: What do you think about these classes?
topics.response_text: It's great, but Bumble's always trying to bug him when he's trying to teach me.

topics.topic_text: Why do you have the nickname Penny?
topics.response_text: It's not a nickname! My name's Penelope.{A little indignant}

topics.topic_text: Penny, come on. Rory's a mungo. You've got to stick with your friends.
topics.response_text: I know, I know... but he was so nice to me. I just wanted him to be safe.

topics.topic_text: Penny, come on. You can't save Rory. It's time to save yourself.
topics.response_text: I know... I just wanted him to be safe. They were gonna sell him and then he was gonna leave and I'd never see him again and... and...

topics.topic_text: We don't have time for this. We need to leave. Now!
Okay, what do you want me to do?
Fine, let's get Rory and get the hell out of here.
topics.response_text: I can't. If they see me out there, they'll throw me back in and then I'll never get out. You have to do it.

topics.topic_text: I tried, but he didn't make it.
topics.response_text: Poor Rory... He was a nice man. He deserved better.

topics.topic_text: I got him out, all right. Now it's your turn.
Yes, he's safe. Now get moving!
Um... sure. Maybe you'll see him sometime later. Not now, though. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: Okay, if you say so. I'm getting out of here, then.

topics.topic_text: Come on, let's go. We need to get you out of here now.
topics.response_text: I already told Sammy AND Squirrel I'm not going. I'm not leaving Rory!{defiant, petulant}

topics.topic_text: Why are you still in here? It's time to go.
topics.response_text: No! I'm not leaving while they've still got Rory locked up!

conversation.response_text: Can you tell me more about growing up, big brother?
Well, then why you do have to go to Big Town when you grow up?{A little sad, since she knows her brother has to leave for Big Town soon.}
May I have some food, please?
Big brother, can I ask you something?
What's going to happen when you get too old and have to leave Lamplight?
And when I grow up, I can come join you there, too!
But I still hope you don't have to leave too soon, okay?
It's always nicer to be in here than out there.
That makes sense. Talk to you later.

description:
Penny is a 11 year-old African American Female.

Penny is a young African American girl with dark, curly hair and bright, observant eyes. Despite her circumstances, she carries herself with a quiet dignity. She's thin from malnutrition but retains an agile build from her days of scavenging in the wasteland. She often wears tattered clothes that were once cleaner and brighter, remnants of her life in Little Lamplight.

Penny's Personality: Penny is observant, resourceful, and caring. She's developed a keen understanding of wasteland creatures and survival skills despite her young age. She's deeply empathetic, particularly toward those suffering, as evidenced by her concern for Rory Maclaren. She looks up to her brother Joseph and aspires to be as resourceful and wise as him.

Penny's Backstory: Penny was born and raised in Little Lamplight, a unique underground cavern settlement inhabited solely by children. From a young age, she showed an aptitude for survival, learning to identify edible plants and understand animal behavior. She has an older brother named Joseph whom she deeply admires for his resourcefulness and wisdom. In August of 2277, Penny and several other children from Little Lamplight were captured by slavers and taken to Paradise Falls, where they are now held as slaves.
